Invalid Email Address No Internet Please check your internet connection and try again. Error sending code An unknown error occurred when sending email. Contact Skydio support. Invalid email New Code Sent Check your email at %s to find the code. Invalid Code Make sure that you use the code sent to %s and that it has not yet been used. Error verifying code Incorrect organization This device belongs to a different organization. Error retrieving configuration An unknown error occurred when verifying code; contact support and we'll help you out. An unknown error occurred when retrieving your account configuration; contact support and we'll help you out. Connect the battery. Done Press the power button for 3 seconds. Activate Drone Enter your email to verify your account. Email address email@example.com Get Started Terms of Use Submit Next Agree Skydio needs some permissions to fly. Location Allows your drone to return to your current GPS location and view your location on a map. Microphone Your microphone allows Skydio to record audio during your flight. Enable Services Skip Add the WiFi information for your drone. WiFi SSID Password ABCD1234 Tap Connect after the lights on your drone are solid blue. Connection Failed Ensure that your WiFi information is correct. Connected to Drone Connect Edit WiFi Additional Software Required A Skydio Autonomy license is required to use this controller. Connect to the Internet Internet Connection Successful Continue Internet Connection Failed Select a Wi-Fi network or plug in an ethernet adapter to continue. Update Abort Update This will stop the update in progress. You will have to start over. Abort Update Continue Updating Restart Update %s Start Update Extra Details Software ID: %1$s
File Key: %2$s Software Update %s What's new in %1$s
Update Size: %2$s Do not leave the app. Do not leave the app or power off your drone. Do not power off your drone. @string/logSync_cancel To update, please address: Grant Permissions Start Update Drone Battery Charge the battery to at least %d%%. Grant Phone Permissions Grant the Skydio app permission to use your phone's storage. Free Up Phone Storage Storage Error Skydio cannot access storage. Please clear up space and try again Free %s on this mobile device. Connect to Internet Connect to a cellular or WiFi network to download the update. Connect to a WiFi network to download the update. INSTALL WITH COMPUTER The update must finish. Error downloading. Please try again.
File is Saved Connect to the internet so that we can send you an email. The release could not be found.

Please contact Skydio support. The release is not available yet.

Please contact Skydio support. Could not send email for the release.

Please contact Skydio support. Sending a message with a link to the update to your registered email address: A message with a link to the update was just sent to your registered email address: Click the link on your computer to save the file.
Next Download Download pending

Make sure you are connected to a WiFi network with internet access. Download pending

Disconnect from your drone's WiFi network to proceed. Download paused

Make sure you have internet access and it should resume automatically. Download paused

Make sure you are connected to a WiFi network with internet access. Download paused

Make sure you are connected to the internet. Download paused

Waiting a moment before retrying. Download paused

Disconnect from your drone's WiFi network to proceed. Downloading New Software Download complete Download failed Download failed

Not enough space available on your phone. Clear some space and try again. Download failed
Error code %d Download failed
Checksum mismatch Download cancelled Download status unknown Drone Software %s Verifying Downloaded File Checking for existing download Download Available
Disconnect Beacon Power off your Beacon and connect directly to your drone to continue. Disconnect Controller Power off your Controller and connect directly to your drone to continue. Contacting %s Release Mismatch Restart the app and try again. Waiting for %s Switching WiFi Connecting to %s Reconnect Turn on %s and connect to its WiFi. Verifying Software Update Upload Could not connect to your drone. Starting Upload Uploading New Software Upload Failed An error occurred while uploading the file. Ready to Upload Verification Failed The software update was not valid. Please start the update again.
Install Battery Low Charge your drone's battery before updating. Verified Tap install to continue. Installing Software Update Failed Restart your drone. 

Error code: %d
Reboot in Progress Rebooting Drone is Booting Rebooting Switching WiFi to %s Restarting Your drone is restarting. Reconnect to %s.
Finishing Update The lights may turn off and on during the process. 
Attempt %d. Reconnecting The connection was lost while finishing the software update. Your drone is reconnecting. Disconnected %s may be rebooting. Reconnect when the WiFi network is available. Did Not Update Restart your drone and start the update again.
Updated Your drone has been updated. It will reboot and reconnect shortly. Your drone has been updated. Done Cellular data will be used.
Take Control You are going to take control of this drone. Take Control @android:string/cancel Could Not Take Control You are not in control of this drone. @android:string/ok ---------- Are you sure you want to fly? Media will not be recorded unless SD card is formatted. Your SD card does not have enough space to record a full flight. Media will not be recorded unless an SD card is inserted. Your SD card may have files that are unreadable due to corruption. Your SD card may not be able to write media fast enough and will result in dropped frames. Your Beacon battery may not last for a full flight. Your Controller battery may not last for a full flight. Your Phone battery may not last for a full flight. Obstacle avoidance will be disabled. All media has been deleted from %s. Deleting All Media Format Logs Card Clear All Logs From %s This will delete all data on your Logs SD card. This will not delete media. This action is not reversible. All logs have been deleted from %s. Deleting All Logs Factory Reset Delete All Data This will format the SD card, delete all logs, restore the factory WiFi password, and reset %s. All stored data has been deleted and %s has been reset to its default settings. Reconnect to your drone once it finishes rebooting. Deleting All Data Delete Complete Delete Connection to %s lost.

No data has been removed. USB Cable Connected Please remove the attached cable and try again. Open Settings Storage Permissions Required The app must have permissions to access external media storage before continuing.
Send Support Logs You are about to share information with Skydio support to validate your warranty claim. The information includes video, audio, images, email address, and performance telemetry. Skydio will retain this information indefinitely. Visit the Skydio Privacy Policy, available at skydio.com/legal, for detailed information. If your logs are encrypted, insert your security key now. Your vehicle was provisioned with a yubikey, and your logs may be encrypted. Turn on your vehicle and insert your yubikey to decrypt your logs for Skydio Support. If your vehicle is lost, you will not be able to export logs to your flash drive. Next Upload to Skydio Support Connect Controller to Wifi to Continue Export to Drive
Skydio Support Logs Select Upload Type You may upload a single flight log or controller logs. Flight logs provide greater detail and are preferred, but you must connect to your drone to upload. Export Flight Logs You may export a single flight or all flight data. Send Single Flight Log Send Controller Logs Send Phone Logs Skydio Support Logs No Flights Found STEP <b>%1$d</b> of <b>%2$d</b> Do not leave this app. Finished exporting logs. Please wait 30s before ejecting Do not leave this app or power off your drone. Do not leave this app or power off your drone. Downloading %s Do not leave this app or power off your Beacon. Share Open Skydio Snapshot Autonomous shot on Skydio Share: Skydio Clip Autonomous shot on Skydio Share:
Normal Original video without any effects. Stabilize Remove fisheye and stabilize. Zoom + Stabilize Remove fisheye, zoom in on the subject, and stabilize. Workout Shows subject speed as a speedometer. Hyperlapse Stabilized time-lapse with blended frames. Voxels 3D voxel visualization of the scene will be added to image. Select Video Effects Save
Skip Next DONE New Features December 2018 Release Welcome! The battery icon has a new look Here's the breakdown Green is the nominal flight time
Orange is the amount needed to return safely
Red is the amount before an Auto-Land The Countdown When the battery icon turns red, you will have two minutes of battery remaining until a forced landing. The Warning Once your drone starts landing because of low battery, you will see this warning icon. You can not cancel a landing while in low battery.
Your Drone is Connected Connected to %s Your Drone is Flying Tap to control your drone. Landing Tap to control your drone. Problem while Flying Tap to see more and control your drone. Your Drone is Emergency Landing Tap to see more Lost Connection to Drone Tap to reconnect to your drone. Dismiss Control of Your Drone Was Stolen Tap to commandeer this drone. Drone Battery is Low Tap to pick a safe landing place for your drone. Subject Lost Tap to select a new subject. Syncing files Publishing telemetry
App is too old Update the app to keep in touch with the Skydio server. Update Now Later

CONTROLLER Pair your drone to your Controller and then connect the Controller to your phone. Controller settings are available when you are connected to your drone. Controller Disconnected Flight Sensitivity Gimbal Sensitivity DEFAULT CUSTOM Roll Pitch Yaw Throttle
DRONE Connect to your drone to access drone settings. Height Floor Your drone will try to stay at least %s above the ground while tracking for the safety of nearby people and objects. This may degrade tracking performance. 8 ft 2.5 m Your drone can fly close to the ground while tracking. Always use caution and be aware of nearby people and objects. Height Ceiling The maximum flying altitude is 100 m. The maximum flying altitude is 500 m.
You are responsible for abiding by all laws and regulations. Terms of Use You certify that you are aware of local regulations, have permission to fly above 100 m, will proceed with caution, and will manage connection and battery life carefully. Accept Cancel Obstacle Avoidance Your drone will stay 0.9 meters away from obstacles. Your drone will stay 0.45 meters away from obstacles. Light Strobe Your drone will regularly flash a visible spectrum strobe light. Your drone will not use its visible spectrum strobe light. Infrared Light Strobe Your drone will regularly flash an infrared spectrum strobe light. Your drone will not use its infrared spectrum strobe light.

To optimize your Live Streaming experience connect to a 2.4 GHz wireless network
 5 GHz wireless networks are not recommended for Live Streaming Check your internet connection You can still fly the vehicle while your internet connection is down but live streaming will not work. Live viewers
ReadyLink Anyone with this ReadyLink can see your drone's live stream Not Started The link is active 24 hours from the time it is generated QR Code Active for 24 hours Anyone with the ReadyLink will not have access to this drone's live stream anymore This action cannot be undone Start ReadyLink Stop ReadyLink Cancel Confirm ReadyLink Unavailable Ensure you are in the same organization as the vehicle you are flying.

Avoidance Disable Obstacle Avoidance Enable Obstacle Avoidance Standard Minimal Emissivity Humidity Gain High Tail Low Tail 60 Hz 50 Hz Do Not Store Flight History Store Flight History Disable High Power Operation Enable High Power Operation North America Australia and New Zealand Flight history data will not be written to the Media Card.
